SEARCH
Package com.myfinanceapp.service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.myfinanceapp.service.UserService
public class UserService extends Object
Service class for managing user accounts and authentication. This service provides functionality for: - User registration with secure password handling - User authentication and login - User profile management (username, password, security questions) - User data persistence in JSON format The service ensures that user UIDs remain constant throughout the application and handles all user-related data operations securely.
Version:
4.0
Author:
SE_Group110

  • Constructor Details

      public UserService()

  • Method Details

    • registerUser

      public boolean registerUser(String username, String password, String secQuestion, String secAnswer)
      Registers a new user in the system. Generates a unique UID and salt for the user, and stores their information in the user database.
      Parameters:
      username - The desired username for the new account
      password - The user's password
      secQuestion - The security question for account recovery
      secAnswer - The answer to the security question
      Returns:
      true if registration is successful, false if username already exists

    • checkLogin

      public boolean checkLogin(String username, String password)
      Validates user login credentials.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check
      password - The password to verify
      Returns:
      true if credentials are valid, false otherwise

    • findUserByUsername

      public User findUserByUsername(String username)
      Finds a user by their username. The search is case-insensitive.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to search for
      Returns:
      The User object if found, null otherwise

    • findUserByUid

      public User findUserByUid(String uid)
      Finds a user by their unique identifier (UID). This method ensures that user identification remains consistent throughout the application.
      Parameters:
      uid - The unique identifier to search for
      Returns:
      The User object if found, null otherwise

    • updateUserName

      public boolean updateUserName(String oldUsername, String newUsername)
      Updates a user's username while maintaining their UID. Ensures the new username is not already taken.
      Parameters:
      oldUsername - The current username
      newUsername - The desired new username
      Returns:
      true if the update is successful, false if the new username is taken

    • loginGetUser

      public User loginGetUser(String username, String password)
      Retrieves a complete User object after successful login. This method is used to get the full user profile after authentication.
      Parameters:
      username - The username used for login
      password - The password used for login
      Returns:
      The complete User object if login is successful, null otherwise

    • updatePassword

      public boolean updatePassword(String uid, String newPassword)
      Updates a user's password. The user is identified by their UID to ensure consistency.
      Parameters:
      uid - The unique identifier of the user
      newPassword - The new password to set
      Returns:
      true if the password was updated successfully, false if user not found

    • updateSecurityQuestion

      public boolean updateSecurityQuestion(String uid, String newQuestion, String newAnswer)
      Updates a user's security question and answer. The user is identified by their UID to ensure consistency.
      Parameters:
      uid - The unique identifier of the user
      newQuestion - The new security question
      newAnswer - The new answer to the security question
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false if user not found
